  1. """Templatetags for the ``hero_slider`` app."""
  2. from django import template
  4. from hero_slider.models import SliderItem
  7. register = template.Library()
  10. @register.inclusion_tag('hero_slider/carousel.html', takes_context=True)
  11. def render_hero_slider(context):
  12. """
  13. Renders the hero slider.
  15. """
  16. req = context.get('request')
  17. qs = SliderItem.objects.published(req).order_by('position')
  18. return {
  19. 'slider_items': qs,
  20. }
